H0.text: What sport or pastime would you be playing if your balls were black and blue and your opponent's were red and yellow. Bocce Ball

H1.text: What sport or pastime would you be playing if your balls were black and blue and your opponent's were red and yellow. Pool

H2.text: What sport or pastime would you be playing if your balls were black and blue and your opponent's were red and yellow. Golf

H3.text: What sport or pastime would you be playing if your balls were black and blue and your opponent's were red and yellow. Croquet

A4.text: Bocce is a ball sport belonging to the boules family of games.

A5.text: Bocce is played around Western, Southern, and Southeast Europe, as well as in overseas areas with historical Italian immigrant population, including Australia, North and South America, principally Argentina and the southern Brazilian states of Paran√°, Rio Grande do Sul and Santa Catarina.
